SELECT C.ID AreaID , C.OrgName AreaName , B.ID OrganizationID , B.OrgName OrganizationName , A.ID ProjectID , A.Name ProjectName , IsNoAllotRole FROM dbo.B_Project (NOLOCK) A JOIN dbo.S_Organization (NOLOCK) B ON A.BUGUID = B.ID JOIN dbo.S_Organization (NOLOCK) C ON B.PID = C.ID JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm ON sgm.ProjectID = A.ID AND sgm.IsDel = 0 AND sgm.Status = 1 AND sgm.RoleID = '8100EAF4-FBCE-408B-A51D-B7247A3ADB19' AND sgm.MemberID = #{UserID} WHERE A.Level = 1 AND A.IsDel = 0 AND A.Status = 1 AND A.IsNoAllotRole = 0
AND A.Name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ProjectName},'%')
ORDER BY C.OrgName , A.Name
SELECT UserID FROM S_AccountUserProject WHERE UserID = #{UserID}
mapper.update: UPDATE S_AccountUserProject SET ProjectID = #{ProjectID} WHERE UserID = #{UserID}
mapper.select: SELECT o.ProjectID , dbo.F_ChannelName(o.ClueID) AS ChannelName , o.CustomerID , o.CustomerName , c.Mobile CustomerMobile, ISNULL(c.Gender,cc.Gender) Gender, dbo.F_DictName(ISNULL(c.Gender,cc.Gender)) AS CustomerGender , o.OpportunitySource , dbo.F_DictName(o.OpportunitySource) AS OpportunitySourceName , (CASE WHEN ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN o.SaleUserID ELSE o.SalePartnerID END) SaleUserID , (CASE WHEN ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN su.Name ELSE su1.Name END) SaleUserName , (CASE WHEN ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN sg.Name ELSE sg1.Name END) GroupName, #{SiteUrl} + (CASE WHEN ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN su.HeadImg ELSE su1.HeadImg END) SaleHeadImg , o.VisitsCount , c.Remark, cc.CreateTime ReportTime, o.TheFirstVisitDate, (SELECT TOP 1 VisitTime FROM dbo.B_ClueAllocation WHERE ClueID = o.ClueID ORDER BY VisitTime DESC) VisitTime, dbo.F_GetSaleCustomerTag(o.CustomerID, o.SaleUserID) AS CustomerTag FROM dbo.B_Opportunity AS o INNER JOIN dbo.B_Customer AS c ON o.CustomerID = c.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Clue cc ON o.ClueID = cc.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su ON o.SaleUserID = su.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm ON o.SaleUserID = sgm.MemberID AND sgm.IsDel = 0 AND sgm.Status = 1 AND sgm.RoleID = '0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' AND sgm.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroup sg ON sgm.ReceptionGroupID = sg.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su1 ON o.SalePartnerID = su1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm1 ON o.SalePartnerID = sgm1.MemberID AND sgm1.IsDel = 0 AND sgm1.Status = 1 AND sgm.RoleID = '0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' AND sgm1.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroup sg1 ON sgm1.ReceptionGroupID = sg1.ID WHERE c.Mobile = #{Mobile} AND o.ProjectID = #{ProjectID}
SELECT AdviserGroupID, RuleType, clueID ID, clueName Name, IsChoose FROM V_CustomerPotentialClue WHERE 1=1 ${WHERE}

SELECT cc.IntentProjectID ProjectID , dbo.F_ChannelName(cc.ID) AS ChannelName , cc.CustomerPotentialID , cp.Name CustomerName , cp.Mobile CustomerMobile , cp.Gender , dbo.F_DictName(cp.Gender) AS CustomerGender, cr.RuleType FROM dbo.B_CustomerPotential cp LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Clue cc ON cc.CustomerPotentialID = cp.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ClueRule cr ON cc.RuleID = cr.ID WHERE cp.Mobile = #{Mobile} AND cc.IntentProjectID = #{ProjectID}
SELECT TOP 1 Status FROM dbo.B_Clue WHERE ID = #{clueID} ORDER BY CreateTime DESC

SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT n.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY n.ReportTime DESC ) num FROM ( SELECT o.ProjectID , dbo.F_ChannelName(o.ClueID) AS ChannelName , o.CustomerID , o.CustomerName , c.Mobile CustomerMobile , c.Gender , dbo.F_DictName(c.Gender) AS CustomerGender , o.OpportunitySource , vc.ClueName OpportunitySourceName , cc.CreateTime ReportTime, ca.VisitTime, cc.SourceType FROM dbo.B_Opportunity AS o INNER JOIN dbo.B_Customer AS c ON o.CustomerID = c.ID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Clue cc ON o.ClueID = cc.ID AND cc.IsDel = 0 AND cc.Status <= 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ClueAllocation ca ON ca.ClueID = c.ID LEFT JOIN V_CustomerPotentialClue vc ON vc.ClueID = cc.ID INNER JOIN B_CustomerFollowUp f ON (f.OpportunityID = o.ID AND f.FollwUpWay='E30825AA-B894-4A5F-AF55-24CAC34C8F1F' AND f.FollwUpUserID=#{pmap.UserID}) WHERE o.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} AND o.SaleUserID = 'C4C09951-FA39-4982-AAD1-E72D9D4C3899' AND ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' ) n WHERE 1=1 ${pmap.WHERE} ) a WHERE a.num > (#{pmap.PageIndex}-1) * #{pmap.PageSize} AND a.num <= #{pmap.PageIndex} * #{pmap.PageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT o.ProjectID , dbo.F_ChannelName(o.ClueID) AS ChannelName , o.CustomerID , o.CustomerName , c.Mobile CustomerMobile , c.Gender , dbo.F_DictName(c.Gender) AS CustomerGender , o.OpportunitySource , vc.ClueName OpportunitySourceName , cc.CreateTime ReportTime, ca.VisitTime, cc.SourceType FROM dbo.B_Opportunity AS o INNER JOIN dbo.B_Customer AS c ON o.CustomerID = c.ID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Clue cc ON o.ClueID = cc.ID AND cc.IsDel = 0 AND cc.Status <= 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ClueAllocation ca ON ca.ClueID = c.ID LEFT JOIN V_CustomerPotentialClue vc ON vc.ClueID = cc.ID INNER JOIN B_CustomerFollowUp f ON (f.OpportunityID = o.ID AND f.FollwUpWay='E30825AA-B894-4A5F-AF55-24CAC34C8F1F' AND f.FollwUpUserID=#{pmap.UserID}) WHERE o.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} AND o.SaleUserID = 'C4C09951-FA39-4982-AAD1-E72D9D4C3899' AND ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' ) n WHERE 1=1 ${pmap.WHERE}

SELECT a.*,count(1) Num from( SELECT (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 0 OR ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN o.SaleUserID ELSE o.SalePartnerID END) SaleUserID , (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 0 OR ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN su.Name ELSE su1.Name END) SaleUserName , (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 0 OR ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN su.TelPhone ELSE su1.TelPhone END) TelPhone, (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 0 OR ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN sg.Name ELSE sg1.Name END) GroupName, #{pmap.SiteUrl} + (CASE WHEN ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN su.HeadImg ELSE su1.HeadImg END) SaleHeadImg FROM dbo.B_Opportunity AS o INNER JOIN dbo.B_Customer AS c ON o.CustomerID = c.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su ON o.SaleUserID = su.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm ON o.SaleUserID = sgm.MemberID AND sgm.IsDel = 0 AND sgm.Status = 1 AND sgm.RoleID = '0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' AND sgm.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroup sg ON sgm.ReceptionGroupID = sg.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su1 ON o.SalePartnerID = su1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm1 ON o.SalePartnerID = sgm1.MemberID AND sgm1.IsDel=0 AND sgm1.Status=1 AND sgm1.RoleID='0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' AND sgm1.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroup sg1 ON sgm1.ReceptionGroupID = sg1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Clue cc ON o.ClueID = cc.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ClueAllocation ca ON ca.OpportunityID = o.ID WHERE o.IsDel = 0 AND o.Status > 0 AND o.Status <> 6 AND ISNULL(o.SaleUserID,'') != 'C4C09951-FA39-4982-AAD1-E72D9D4C3899' AND o.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} ${pmap.WHERE} ) a where a.SaleUserID!='' and a.SaleUserID is not null and a.GroupName is not null and a.GroupName!='' GROUP BY a.SaleUserID,a.SaleUserName,a.GroupName,a.SaleHeadImg,a.TelPhone

SELECT o.ProjectID , o.CustomerID , o.CustomerName , c.Mobile CustomerMobile , c.Gender , dbo.F_DictName(c.Gender) AS CustomerGender , o.OpportunitySource , dbo.F_DictName(o.OpportunitySource) AS OpportunitySourceName , (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 0 OR ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN o.SaleUserID ELSE o.SalePartnerID END) SaleUserID , (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 0 OR ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN su.Name ELSE su1.Name END) SaleUserName , (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 0 OR ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN sg.Name ELSE sg1.Name END) GroupName, #{pmap.SiteUrl} + (CASE WHEN ISNULL(o.SalePartnerID,'') = '' THEN su.HeadImg ELSE su1.HeadImg END) SaleHeadImg , cc.CreateTime ReportTime, ca.VisitTime FROM dbo.B_Opportunity AS o INNER JOIN dbo.B_Customer AS c ON o.CustomerID = c.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su ON o.SaleUserID = su.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm ON o.SaleUserID = sgm.MemberID AND sgm.IsDel = 0 AND sgm.Status = 1 AND sgm.RoleID = '0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' AND sgm.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroup sg ON sgm.ReceptionGroupID = sg.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su1 ON o.SalePartnerID = su1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm1 ON o.SalePartnerID = sgm1.MemberID AND sgm1.IsDel=0 AND sgm1.Status=1 AND sgm1.RoleID='0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' AND sgm1.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroup sg1 ON sgm1.ReceptionGroupID = sg1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Clue cc ON o.ClueID = cc.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ClueAllocation ca ON ca.OpportunityID = o.ID WHERE o.IsDel = 0 AND o.Status > 0 AND o.Status <> 6 AND ISNULL(o.SaleUserID,'') != 'C4C09951-FA39-4982-AAD1-E72D9D4C3899' AND o.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} ${pmap.WHERE}

SELECT o.ProjectID , o.CustomerID , o.CustomerName , c.Mobile CustomerMobile, dbo.F_DictName(c.Gender) CustomerGender , dbo.F_DictName(o.OpportunitySource) OpportunitySourceName , o.SaleUserID , su.Name SaleUserName , sg.Name GroupName, #{pmap.SiteUrl} + su.HeadImg SaleHeadImg, o.SalePartnerID , (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 1 THEN su1.Name ELSE '' END) SalePartnerName, (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 1 THEN sg1.Name ELSE '' END) SalePartnerGroupName, (CASE WHEN ca.IsOld = 1 THEN #{pmap.SiteUrl} + su1.HeadImg ELSE '' END) SalePartnerHeadImg, c.Remark, cc.ReportUserName ReportName, cc.ReportUserMobile ReportMobile, cc.CreateTime ReportTime, o.TheFirstVisitDate , ca.VisitTime FROM dbo.B_Opportunity AS o INNER JOIN dbo.B_Customer AS c ON o.CustomerID = c.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su ON o.SaleUserID = su.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm ON o.SaleUserID = sgm.MemberID AND sgm.IsDel=0 AND sgm.Status=1 AND sgm.RoleID='0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' AND sgm.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroup sg ON sgm.ReceptionGroupID = sg.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su1 ON o.SalePartnerID = su1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm1 ON o.SalePartnerID = sgm1.MemberID AND sgm1.IsDel=0 AND sgm1.Status=1 AND sgm1.RoleID='0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' AND sgm1.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroup sg1 ON sgm1.ReceptionGroupID = sg1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Clue cc ON o.ClueID = cc.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ClueAllocation ca ON ca.OpportunityID = o.ID INNER JOIN B_CustomerFollowUp f ON (f.OpportunityID = o.ID AND f.FollwUpWay='E30825AA-B894-4A5F-AF55-24CAC34C8F1F' AND f.FollwUpUserID=#{FollwUpUserID}) WHERE o.IsDel = 0 AND o.Status > 0 AND o.Status <> 6 AND o.SaleUserID IS NOT NULL AND o.SaleUserID ! = '' AND o.SaleUserID != 'C4C09951-FA39-4982-AAD1-E72D9D4C3899' AND o.ProjectID = #{pmap.ProjectID} AND (o.SaleUserID = #{pmap.SaleUserID} OR o.SalePartnerID = #{pmap.SaleUserID}) ${pmap.WHERE} ORDER BY ca.VisitTime DESC
